§ 1931. Repealed. Pub. L. 93–618, title VI, § 602(e), Jan. 3, 1975, 88 Stat. 2072
Section, Pub. L. 87–794, title III, § 321, Oct. 11, 1962, 76 Stat. 892, authorized giving of adjustment assistance to workers. See section 2271 et seq. of this title.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective on 90th day following Jan. 3, 1975, see note set out under section 1901 of this title.
